testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test1234@example.com" field...........................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test1234@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: P03_homePage | user can click any slider and navigate to product page
testcase.name: user click on first slider
testcase.failure:
Given user navigated to homePage............................................passed When user choose slider "1".................................................passed Then user is navigated to "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020"...failed
